name: Call of Mini Sniper
description:
it's SHOOT to KILL in this ALL-OUT WAR with the UNDEAD...

► ► ► ► ►

use GUNS, ROCKETS, and even PROPANE TRUCKS to HOLD THE LINE! the ZOMBIES WON'T STOP but NEITHER WILL YOU!

► ► ► ► ►

A mysterious corporation has been testing weapons in the mountains, and those new bioweapons had an unexpected side effect: zombies! You are Rod, the sheriff of Muerte Vista and the only thing standing between the last survivors and complete zombie apocalypse. Time to take aim and save the world one headshot at a time!

► ► ► ► ►

• BRUTAL first-person survival action!
• ULTRA-REALISTIC guns!
• JAW-DROPPING explosions!

► ► ► ► ►

• 6 BLOODTHIRSTY zombie types!
• 21 LETHAL weapons!
• SWAT backup!
• EXPLOSIVES bring the BOOM!
• NONSTOP zombie assaults!

► ► ► ► ►
